description:
My place is close to The myrtle-wyckoff L/M stop, Variety Coffee Roasters , Bossa Nova Civic Club, Maria Hernandez Park, Silent Barn. You’ll love my place because of the location and all my cool books. Bushwick has a lot of various bars, venues and coffee shops all within walking distance. 
There is a pull-out couch, queen sized bed and one twin bed, making it great for families with kids or big groups of friends, and it's pet friendly.
name: Fun Bushwick Apt for Large Group or Family
review: The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
